ID.explanation: This is a unique identifier of the accident record.

Source.explanation: Indicates source of the accident report (i.e. the API which reported the accident.).

TMC.explanation: A traffic accident may have a Traffic Message Channel (TMC) code which provides more detailed description of the event.

codes.246: Traffic queue length increasing at an average rate of 10 km/hr

Severity.explanation: Shows severity of the accident (a number between 1 and 4).

Start_Time.explanation: Shows start time of the accident in local time zone.

End_Time.explanation: Shows end time of the accident in local time zone.

Start_Lat.explanation: Shows latitude in GPS coordinate of the start point.

Start_Lng.explanation: Shows longitude in GPS coordinate of the start point.

Distance(mi).explanation: The length of the road extent affected by the accident.

Description.explanation: Shows natural language description of the accident.

Number.explanation: Shows the street number in address field.

Street.explanation: Shows the street name in address field.

Side.explanation: Shows the relative side of the street (Right/Left) in address field.

City.explanation: Shows the city in address field.

County.explanation: Shows the county in address field.

State.explanation: Shows the state in address field.

Zipcode.explanation: Shows the zipcode in address field.

Country.explanation: Shows the country in address field.

Timezone.explanation: Shows timezone based on the location of the accident (eastern, central, etc.).

Airport_Code.explanation: Denotes an airport-based weather station which is the closest one to location of the accident.

Weather_Timestamp.explanation: Shows the time-stamp of weather observation record (in local time).

Wind_Speed(mph).explanation: Shows wind speed (in miles per hour).

Precipitation(in).explanation: Shows precipitation amount in inches, if there is any.

Weather_Condition.explanation: Shows the weather condition (rain, snow, thunderstorm, fog, etc.)

Amenity.explanation: A POI annotation which indicates presence of amenity in a nearby location.

Bump.explanation: A POI annotation which indicates presence of speed bump or hump in a nearby location.

Crossing.explanation: A POI annotation which indicates presence of crossing in a nearby location.

Give_Way.explanation: A POI annotation which indicates presence of give_way in a nearby location.

No_Exit.explanation: A POI annotation which indicates presence of no_exit in a nearby location.

Railway.explanation: A POI annotation which indicates presence of railway in a nearby location.

Roundabout.explanation: A POI annotation which indicates presence of roundabout in a nearby location.

Station.explanation: A POI annotation which indicates presence of station in a nearby location.

Stop.explanation: A POI annotation which indicates presence of stop in a nearby location.

Traffic_Calming.explanation: A POI annotation which indicates presence of traffic_calming in a nearby location.

Traffic_Signal.explanation: A POI annotation which indicates presence of traffic_signal in a nearby location.

Turning_Loop.explanation: A POI annotation which indicates presence of turning_loop in a nearby location.

Sunrise_Sunset.explanation: Shows the period of day (i.e. day or night) based on sunrise/sunset.

Civil_Twilight.explanation: Shows the period of day (i.e. day or night) based on civil twilight.

Nautical_Twilight.explanation: Shows the period of day (i.e. day or night) based on nautical twilight.

Astronomical_Twilight.explanation: Shows the period of day (i.e. day or night) based on astronomical twilight.
